language.text: Error while performing backup
CMS backup
CMS backup system
Welcome to CMS backup tool. This wizard will guide you through backup process.
Please contact your hosting provider if you need to configure your server. For additional information please email support@cms-guide.com
Starting backup tool.

Preliminary check failed.
Please fix all errors and try running the tool again.
ZipArchive cannot be found. Your backup files will not be archived but you still will be able to download them via FTP.

Backup Service: Folder %storagePath% not found
Please, create it and set permision tto write (0777)
Backup Service: Folder %storagePath% not writable. Please allow writing to this folder.
Folder %folder% not found

Control panel authorization failed.
Please log on to your control panel
Create Backup
<blink>Please wait...</blink>
Backup files before updating CMS to new version
Backup index.php, */*.xml, *.swf, style.css, .htaccess, xml/*.*, modules/*/*.*, admin/*(-admin/libs/sfTemplating -admin/libs/Zend)
*.xml
Start
Cancel
Close
Copying files to temporary folder...
Copying files to temporary folder... completed. Processed %dirs% folders and %files% files.
Copy files to temporary folder... Error: %error%
Creating zip archive...
Creating zip archive... completed: filesize is %size% b.
Creating zip archive... Error
Creating zip archive... skipped. Class ZipArchive not found
Backup process completed.

Backup process completed.
Use this link to download the archive: %zipname%
Backup process completed. However, you don't have ZipArchive so you can Download backup files via FTP. They are located in folder %path%
File %file% not found
Please check if following updater files exist:
Please check if following file(s) exist and are writable:

We have detected that PHP's Safe Mode is enabled on your server. We recommend turning it off for our software to work normally. You can disable safe mode in your hosting control panel or by editing a php.ini file.
